org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.shapes
Class MTComplexPolygon

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.components.MTComponent
      org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.AbstractVisibleComponent
          org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.shapes.AbstractShape
              org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.shapes.mesh.MTTriangleMesh
                  org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.shapes.MTComplexPolygon
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mt4j.components.css.util.CSSStylableComponent, org.mt4j.components.interfaces.IMTComponent, org.mt4j.components.interfaces.IMTComponent3D, org.mt4j.input.IMTInputEventListener, org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.componentProcessors.lassoProcessor.ILassoable, org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.IGestureEventListener
public class MTComplexPolygon
extends org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.shapes.mesh.MTTriangleMesh
implements org.mt4j.components.css.util.CSSStylableComponent

This class is used to display non-simple polygons like concave polygons, polygons with wholes or more than only 1 contour since MTPolygon can only handle convex polygons.

Note: calls to setVertices() will be more expensive here since a triangulation algorithm is used to split the contours up into triangles.
Note: we should only provide 2D vertices (all vertices with the same z value) to not confuse the triangulation algorithm
Note: setGeometryInfo() should never be called directly on this class since the geometry has to first be calculated from the specified vertices. Use setVertices() instead if you want to change the shape.

MTComplexPolygon

public MTComplexPolygon(processing.core.PApplet app,
                        java.util.List<org.mt4j.util.math.Vertex[]> contours)
Instantiates a new mT complex polygon using multiple contours and the ODD winding rule. So if a second contour is inside of the first contour, the second contour would cut a hole into the first one.

Parameters:
app - the app
contours - the contours

MTComplexPolygon

public MTComplexPolygon(processing.core.PApplet app,
                        java.util.List<org.mt4j.util.math.Vertex[]> contours,
                        int windingRule)
Instantiates a new mT complex polygon using multiple contours and the specified winding rule. So if a second contour is inside of the first contour, the second contour would cut a hole into the first one.

Parameters:
app - the app
contours - the contours
windingRule - the winding rule
